results.title: Ronny Chieng: International Student
results.brief_description: Ronny is a Malaysian student who’s come to Australia to study law. Though smart, driven and competitive, he’s also blunt and barbed, so it’s not long before Ronny is at odds with most people on campus.

constellations_other.name: The Family Law
constellations_other.description: An exploration of Asian representation on screens around the world that delves into TV, cinema, documentaries and Disney princesses.

results.description: Ronny is a Malaysian student who’s come to Australia to study law. Though smart, driven and competitive, he’s also blunt and barbed, so it’s not long before Ronny is at odds with most people on campus.

results.title: RocKwiz
results.brief_description: RocKwiz is an Australian television quiz show series, focused on rock music and featuring different guest artist musicians who perform live in each episode. It is broadcast on SBS One and premiered in 2005. As of August 2013 it is in its 11th season.

constellations_other.name: The secret life of suburbia and music videos
constellations_other.description: Australia's famous streets and suburbs have defined music videos, TV shows and miniseries, providing a unique backdrop to Australian stories and music.

results.description: RocKwiz is an Australian television quiz show series, focused on rock music and featuring different guest artist musicians who perform live in each episode. It is broadcast on SBS One and premiered in 2005. As of August 2013 it is in its 11th season.
description_for_label: RocKwiz is an Australian television quiz show series, focused on rock music and featuring different guest artist musicians who perform live in each episode. It is broadcast on SBS One and premiered in 2005. As of August 2013 it is in its 11th season.

results.title: "Shia LaBeouf" LIVE
results.brief_description: Choirs, classical musicians, dancers and aerialists perform live on a stage while Rob Cantor narrates a brutal scene about you, the viewer, being stalked through the woods by a blood-soaked Shia LaBeouf - who is also a cannibal.

constellations_other.name: Now watch this
constellations_other.description: In a video-saturated world, how do you keep focus? Do you keep a close eye on one thing, or step back and watch the parade of images go by, to see the whole thing?

results.description: “Shia LaBeouf” is a comedic song by Rob Cantor about actor Shia LaBeouf. The song, which was released in 2012, depicts LaBeouf as an “actual cannibal” who kills other people for sport. - Wikipedia
description_for_label: “Shia LaBeouf” is a comedic song by Rob Cantor about actor Shia LaBeouf. The song, which was released in 2012, depicts LaBeouf as an “actual cannibal” who kills other people for sport. - Wikipedia

results.title: Riot
results.brief_description: A look at the 1970s Gay Rights Movement in Australia through the eyes of dedicated activist Lance Gowland. As Lance deals with his sexuality, he must also juggle work, family and relationships.

constellations_other.name: Fight for your right
constellations_other.description: Real world revolution and the fictional representations that reflect the struggle for equality in the past, present and dystopian future.

results.description: A look at the 1970s Gay Rights Movement in Australia through the eyes of dedicated activist Lance Gowland. As Lance deals with his sexuality, he must also juggle work, family and relationships.
description_for_label: A look at the 1970s Gay Rights Movement in Australia through the eyes of dedicated activist Lance Gowland. As Lance deals with his sexuality, he must also juggle work, family and relationships.

results.title: Ride Like a Girl
results.creator_credit: Elise McCredie, Andrew Knight, Richard Keddie, Rachel Griffiths and Enbankment Films
results.brief_description: The story of Michelle Payne, the first female jockey to win the Melbourne Cup.

constellations_other.name: Jill Bilcock
constellations_other.description: An editor’s work often goes unnoticed, but they’re scene-stitching not only brings the director’s vision to life but sometimes steals the show. One of Australia’s greatest editors, Jill Bilcock, has shaped some of the country’s most memorable screen stories.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Elise McCredie, Andrew Knight, Richard Keddie, Rachel Griffiths and Enbankment Films
results.description: The story of Michelle Payne, the first female jockey to win the Melbourne Cup.
description_for_label: The story of Michelle Payne, the first female jockey to win the Melbourne Cup.

results.title: Rick and Morty
results.creator_credit: Sydney Ryan, Steve Levy, Nick Rutherford, Albro Lundy IV, Anne Lane, J. Michael Mendel, Lee Harting, Green Portal Productions, Williams Street, Harmonius Claptrap, Justin Roiland's Solo Vanity Card Productions and Starburns Industries
results.brief_description: Rick is a mentally-unbalanced but scientifically gifted old man who has recently reconnected with his family. He spends most of his time involving his young grandson Morty in dangerous, outlandish adventures throughout space and alternate universes. Compounded with Morty’s already unstable family life, these events cause Morty much distress at home and school.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Sydney Ryan, Steve Levy, Nick Rutherford, Albro Lundy IV, Anne Lane, J. Michael Mendel, Lee Harting, Green Portal Productions, Williams Street, Harmonius Claptrap, Justin Roiland’s Solo Vanity Card Productions and Starburns Industries

He spends most of his time involving his young grandson Morty in dangerous, outlandish adventures throughout space and alternate universes. Compounded with Morty’s already unstable family life, these events cause Morty much distress at home and school.

results.title: Rest in Power: The Trayvon Martin Story
results.brief_description: This six-part docuseries focuses on the killing of unarmed Florida teenager Trayvon Martin, whose killer was allowed to go free after he claimed self defense.
results.title_for_label: Rest in Power: The Trayvon Martin Story

video_links.name: 'Rest In Power: The Trayvon Martin Story' Official Teaser | Paramount Network

results.title: Reprisal
results.creator_credit: The Littlefield Company and A+E Studios
results.brief_description: A hyper-noir story that follows a relentless femme fatale who, after being left for dead, sets out to take revenge against her brother and his bombastic gang of gear-heads.
results.description: A hyper-noir story that follows a relentless femme fatale who, after being left for dead, sets out to take revenge against her brother and his bombastic gang of gear-heads.
description_for_label: A hyper-noir story that follows a relentless femme fatale who, after being left for dead, sets out to take revenge against her brother and his bombastic gang of gear-heads.

results.title: Repeat Performance
results.creator_credit: Aubrey Schenck Productions, Bryan Foy Productions, Aubrey Schenck, Alfred L. Werker and Walter Bullock
results.brief_description: On New Year’s Eve 1946, Broadway actress Sheila Page apparently callously shoots dead her husband Barney. As she leaves the crime scene, she wishes she could play the year over with a different script. - Wikipedia

constellations_other.name: Obviously the time continuum has been disrupted...again and again and again!
constellations_other.description: Eadweard Muybridge was able to capture time and play it back again creating endless time paradoxes where subjects are destined to repeat their previous actions. Filmmakers have since explored such notions via time travel narratives questioning destiny, fate and choice.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Aubrey Schenck Productions, Bryan Foy Productions, Aubrey Schenck, Alfred L. Werker and Walter Bullock
results.description: Broadway star, Sheila Page, shoots Barney, her murderous husband on New Year’s Eve. She flees her apartment and goes to her producer, John Friday. When she arrives, it is New Year’s day, a year earlier. She has been given the chance to live life over and correct the errors of the past only to find that the end will be the same although the path will be different.
description_for_label: Broadway star, Sheila Page, shoots Barney, her murderous husband on New Year’s Eve. She flees her apartment and goes to her producer, John Friday. When she arrives, it is New Year’s day, a year earlier. She has been given the chance to live life over and correct the errors of the past only to find that the end will be the same although the path will be different.

results.title: Rebecca
results.brief_description: Story of a young woman who marries a fascinating widower only to find out that she must live in the shadow of his former wife, Rebecca, who died mysteriously several years earlier.

constellations_other.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_other.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

results.description: Story of a young woman who marries a fascinating widower only to find out that she must live in the shadow of his former wife, Rebecca, who died mysteriously several years earlier. The young wife must come to grips with the terrible secret of her handsome, cold husband, Max De Winter. She must also deal with the jealous, obsessed Mrs. Danvers, the housekeeper, who will not accept her as the mistress of the house.
description_for_label: Story of a young woman who marries a fascinating widower only to find out that she must live in the shadow of his former wife, Rebecca, who died mysteriously several years earlier. The young wife must come to grips with the terrible secret of her handsome, cold husband, Max De Winter. She must also deal with the jealous, obsessed Mrs. Danvers, the housekeeper, who will not accept her as the mistress of the house.
